name: Balance Blast
description:
Balance Blast is a competitive arena battle opposing two teams where each one has to control their side of the rink with their voice to slide the bombs on the other side.

Controls for the decibel's variation of each team:
Blue Team: Num 1-2-3-4

Red Team: Num 5-6-7-8

Launch Game: Backspace

Restart Game: Q
